revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=R4500U |revision= |asin= |est_release_date=2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Virata |cpu1_model=VC45100;Helium 100, VC45100, -PBC A2; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Globespan |cpu2_model=GS7070-174 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST39VF016-70-4C-EI |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV4M16DT-7 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:20:E0 }} {{TagLine|USB/Ethernet Home DSL Modem}} :(with Routing Capabilities) :[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=86 Product page]
"ACTIONTEC", "04404A", and "47-0045-2SA3" is silkscreened :on the board populating this entry.
The two large radial capacitors in the power section appear to be :'''Chemi-Con''' caps. Capacitors on the rest of the board are :(at least) a mix of '''GEMCON''', '''Y.J.''', and '''Fullcon''' caps.
The device uses Globespan GS7070 and GT3180 chips for the ADSL modem. :The Ethernet transformer is a '''Mag.Com''' PX-5111S.
The power adapter included with the unit ''may'' be an '''OEM''' :AD-121AG (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 18W -> 12VDC, 1A). The modem's label specifies that it uses a 12V 1.2A PSU, however..
